actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain provisions relating to private carriage of letters, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of Federal law which restrict or prohibit the private carriage of letters. Exempts letters and packages carried by private express from the requirement that all letters and packages carried by a vessel in interstate commerce be delivered promptly to the local post office upon arrival in a port.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain provisions relating to private carriage of letters, and for other purposes.
